mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MSG(MSG_IDX, MSG_TITLE, MSG_CONT, MSG_WRITER, REG_DT, MSG_STATUS, MSG_TYPE) VALUES (MSG_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{msgTitle}, #{msgCont}, #{msgWriter}, TO_DATE(#{regDt},'YYYY-MM-DD-HH24:MI:SS'), 'WAIT', #{msgType})
mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT MSG_IDX, MSG_TITLE, MSG_CONT, MSG_WRITER, TO_CHAR(REG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS REG_DT, MSG_STATUS, MSG_TYPE FROM MSG ORDER BY DECODE ( MSG_STATUS, 'WAIT', 1 ), REG_DT DESC) A WHERE ROWNUM <= ${lastIndex} ) B WHERE B.RNUM > #{firstIndex}
